r.s: Creates DTA files containing money transaction data (Germany).
r.d: Payment_DTA provides functions to create DTA files used in Germany to exchange informations about money transactions with banks or online banking programs.
r.n: [-] fix makeValidString(), was completely broken in 1.3.0a3 (#15791) [-] fixed error in test testValidStringTrue() [!] remove Ã?Ã?Ã?Ã? from $validString_chars [!] mb functions need PHP version = 4.0.6 [+] DTA: add attributes $sum_bankcodes and $sum_accounts [+] add method getMetaData() (on request from Georg Horn) ( [+] Added [-] Fixed [*] Improved [!] Note )
